name: Tall Tales (Deltarax)
description: Tall Tales is an improvisation based party game centered around telling made-up stories. The goal of the game is to tell a concise, structured story about your past “adventures” while incorporating the plot points in your hand. In the process, however, other players will play bad plot points from their hand. It is up to the storyteller to adapt their story on the spot to incorporate these plot points into their story without getting flustered.
